## Tools & Workflow

Map creation was performed in ArcGIS Pro 3.1 using data sourced from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, U.S. Postal Service, and the Esri Living Atlas.

## Final Result

Here is the final map product that I submitted to the [2023 GIS Certification Institute Map Contest](https://www.gisci.org/About-Us/Map-Contest/Previous-Contest-Winners), where is won 2nd place in the professional category.
